text: Ԑberε a wͻn abamu buu wͻ neho no, wͻ’kͻtuu agyina wͻ kokoam. Wͻn mu panin no kaa sε: “Monim sε mode Nyankopͻn din mu adi nse akyerε mopapa, εna modii kan buu moani guu deε na εsεsε moyε ma Yosef soͻ? Enti mennfri asaase yi so kͻpem sε m’agya bεma me ho kwan ansa, anaasε Onyankopͻn bedi (m’asεm) ama me, na Ɔne atemmufoͻ no nyinaa mu Otemmufoᴐ papa paa no
